name: jira-api-tool
description: 一個與 Jira API 互動的工具，用於獲取 Sprint、問題和統計資訊

scripts.sprint-issues: node -e "const JiraApi = require('./jiraApi'); const jira = new JiraApi(); const sprintName = process.argv[1] || 'Sprint 10'; jira.getIssuesInSprint(sprintName).then(data => console.log(JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)));"
scripts.active-sprints: node -e "const JiraApi = require('./jiraApi'); const jira = new JiraApi(); jira.getActiveSprints().then(data => console.log(JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)));"
scripts.issue-details: node -e "const JiraApi = require('./jiraApi'); const jira = new JiraApi(); const issueKey = process.argv[1]; if (!issueKey) { console.error('請提供問題金鑰'); process.exit(1); } jira.getIssueDetails(issueKey).then(data => console.log(JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)));"
